plot: Based on interviews with intellectually disabled women who have been brutalized. They talk about control, manipulation, and violence. And about the strength and courage it takes to leave.
title: Dubbelt utsatt
plot_es: Based on interviews with intellectually disabled women who have been brutalized. They talk about control, manipulation, and violence. And about the strength and courage it takes to leave.
